# supplementaryItems

**Instance Property**

An array of the supplementary items that are anchored to the group.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var supplementaryItems: [NSCollectionLayoutSupplementaryItem] { get set }
```

## Getting the group’s items

- **subitems**: An array of the items contained in the group.

items.description: An array of the items contained in the group.
items.name: subitems
